message.content:
I need to identify the line item related to amounts owed to the entity for goods or services sold or provided on credit from the balance sheet.

Looking at the balance sheet, this would typically be represented by "Accounts Receivable" - which represents money owed to the company by customers who purchased goods or services on credit.

From the balance sheet provided:
- Accounts Receivable had an initial value of 0.00 on 2023-12-31
- Accounts Receivable had an end value of 330748.44 on 2024-02-01

Therefore, the initial and end values of amounts owed to the entity for goods or services sold on credit are:

```json
{"solution": {'initial value': '0.00', 'end value': '330748.44'}}
```
